participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is adventurous and enjoys exploring the outdoors. She is caring and has a strong work ethic.
participant_1.background: i like to ride horses. i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: Matt
participant_2.personality: Matt is practical and down-to-earth. He has a creative side and finds joy in simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

content.text: What are you up to today
